title: DELEADED TWO BEDROOM APARTEMENT FOR RENT
posting_body: ['This is a two bedroom one bathroom apartment with a living room and a modern eat in kitchen.', 'It comes with a refrigerator, dishwasher, disposal, in unit washer/dryer hook ups, new gas heating/central air conditioning system and storage space.', 'Very large landscaped back yard and off street parking.', 'This apartment is on the first floor of a three unit building.', 'Nice residential location.', 'Walk to Commuter rail station, Town center, super markets, banks, restaurants, bus stop, and schools.', 'Tenant pays for gas and electricity.', 'No smoking of any kind.', 'Small pets allowed.', 'First last and security deposit reguired.', 'No Fees.', 'We accept Section 8.', 'This unit is deleaded and certified.', '$ 2,500 per month.', 'Minimum one year lease.', 'For more information please call 617-650-1819.', 'Thank you.']
